decision_conditions: The development shall only be occupied in accordance with the Memorandum of Agreement Reason : In order to maintain the free flow of traffic in the surrounding roads in the interest of highway safety. In accordance with Policy DM9 of the RBK Core Strategy 2012 and DM10 of the RBK Core Strategy 2012.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 19 (Parking Legal Agreement) of planning permission 19/00582/FUL (Demolition of existing buildings and erection of a new 80 bed, three-storey dementia nursing home (Use Class C2) with associated gardens, pedestrian and vehicle access, car parking and servicing area)
